title: March Pixel Feature Drop: Hands-on with all the new additions [Video]
content:
In case launching Android 12L today wasn’t enough, Google has also released the March Pixel Feature Drop, the first such software update of 2022. Read on to learn about some of the top new features exclusive to Google Pixel phones.

more…

The post March Pixel Feature Drop: Hands-on with all the new additions [Video] appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The March 2022 Pixel Feature Drop is here, which means if you own a Pixel device, a flurry of new features are ready for you to download.
